title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.2 - Depreciation on major movable equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 455.2 - Depreciation on major movable equipment

State Regulations

This functional reporting center must contain all
depreciation on major movable equipment of the residential health care
facility. Note the special rules shown in section
452.4
(a)(1)(iii)
of this Article for assignment of major movable depreciation to
departments. (a) Standard unit of
measure. None. (b) Data source. Not
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
455.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
